name: Personalized poster as a gift Idea for man and woman for Valentine's Day, anniversary, wedding anniversary or wedding
description:
This art print is the ideal gift for any occasion. Especially as a wedding gift, for anniversary, Valentine's Day, wedding anniversary or in between.

OUR PAPER = OUR UNIQUE SELLING POINT
The printing takes place on high-quality paper produced in Germany by Hahnemühle. The white, 310g cardboard-like artist paper provides an enormous image depth with precise contrasts and has no plastic coating. This clearly distinguishes us from simple poster prints. You get a real art print here!

THAT'S US
We are Anja, René and miniature dachshund Lotte. We manufacture everything ourselves and can guarantee the highest quality and first-class customer service with every order. With the purchase of our prints you get a satisfaction guarantee!

Sizes
We offer printing in sizes A6 to A1, 40 x 30 cm, 60 x 40 cm and 50 x 70 cm. You select the size during the ordering process.

DIGITAL FILE
You will receive the product as a PDF file by e-mail to the e-mail address with which you ordered (please check SPAM folder!). You can print the file in all common DIN A sizes.

FRAME/POSTER BAR
Basically, there is no frame/poster bar in your print. With our high-quality A4 solid wood frames (black covered, white covered, natural oak), which are produced from sustainable, FSC-certified wood, you have the opportunity to buy the product as an all-in-one solution! The same applies to our high-quality poster strip made of solid oak wood. When ordering, select e.g. "A4+ frame black" or "A4 + poster bar".

PACKAGING EXPERIENCE
Your order is a gift? Then you provide an additional WOW effect in addition to the already unmistakable unpacking experience with our great surprise, which is included with the order! We use sustainable cardboard, recycled packaging materials, stickers made of grass paper and wrapping paper made of natural rubber.

DISPATCH
Shipping is fast and climate-neutral via DHL GoGreen and the German Post INCLUDING tracking number, which will be sent to you directly after shipping! As a registered user, you can track the shipment status at any time. This is not possible with a guest order.

ASK
Do you have a question or a wish? Please do not hesitate to write to us! We will answer you as soon as possible.

OUR SHOP
Follow the link and discover our other products: www.naturbedacht.etsy.com
category: Home & Living < Home Decor < Wall Decor

review.reviewBody: Ich bin sehr zufrieden! Total schneller Versand und das Ergebnis ist einfach nur super schön. Vielen lieben Dank 🤍

Das Bild  ist wirklich der Hammer. Der Geburtstag meiner Tochter. Sie hat sich so sehr darüber gefreut. Danke für eure Hilfe. 
Kann euch jedem nur weiter empfehlen. Vielen lieben Dank

Ein wunderschöner Traumfänger und einen ganz lieben Kontakt mit Janine. 
Alle Wünsche wurden erfüllt. Empfehle ich super gerne weiter

Kann ich nur wärmstens empfehlen ! Sehr netter Kundenkontakt, am nächsten Tag war meine Bestellung da - super hochwertiges Papier und wirklich eine tolle Qualität! Bin rundum begeistert und werde definitiv bald wieder bestellen
